org.dblp

Interface DblpInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCoauthorGraph, SimpleCoauthorGraph, SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph, WeightedCoauthorGraph

    public interface DblpInterface
    The root interface for accessing data from any dblp DB structure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.stream.Stream<Booktitle> booktitles()
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all booktitles in the MMDB.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Person> coauthors(Person person)
      Retrieves a sequential stream of all coauthors of the given person.

      Search for the booktitle object with the given booktitle string.

      Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all booktitles in the MMDB.

      default java.util.stream.Stream<PublicationStream> publicationStreams()
      Retrieves a combined, sequential stream of all publication stream venues (i.e., all booktitles and all journals) in the MMDB.

                  throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Search for the record with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the record to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The record, or null if there is no such publication.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified key is null.

      • hasPublication

        boolean hasPublication(java.lang.String key)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Checks whether a publication with the given record key is present in dblp.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the publication to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the publication with the specified key is present, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified key is null.

      • numberOfPublications

        int numberOfPublications()
        Retrieve the number of publications in dblp.
        Returns:
        The number of publications.

      • numberOfPublications

        default int numberOfPublications(Person pers)
                          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Retrieve the number of publications of a given person.
        Parameters:
        pers - The person.
        Returns:
        The number of publications of that person. If the given person is not in dblp, this method will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified name is null.

      • numberOfPublications

        default int numberOfPublications(PersonName name)
                          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Retrieve the number of publications of a given person. Publications of any alias name of the given name are counted, too.
        Parameters:
        name - The person.
        Returns:
        The number of publications of that person. If the given person is not in dblp, this method will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified name is null.

      • numberOfPublications

        default int numberOfPublications(java.lang.String key)
                          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Retrieve the number of publications of a given person.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the person.
        Returns:
        The number of publications of that person.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified key is null.

      • hasPerson

        boolean hasPerson(java.lang.String key)
           throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Checks whether a person with the given record key is present in dblp.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the person to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the person with the specified key is present, otherwise false .
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified key is null.

      • getPerson

        Person getPerson(java.lang.String key)
          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Search for a Person with a known record key. Person redirections ("crossref") are resolved silently.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the Person to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The person, or null if there is no such person.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified key is null.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the person to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the person with the specified name is present, otherwise false .

      • hasPersonByName

        boolean hasPersonByName(java.lang.String name)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Checks whether a person with the exact given dblp person name is present in dblp. The person name must include any potential homonym number.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the person to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the person with the specified key is present, otherwise false .
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified name is null.

      • getPersonByName

        Person getPersonByName(java.lang.String name)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Search for a Person with the exact given dblp person name. The person name must include any potential homonym number.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Person to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Person object, or null if there is no such person.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified name is null.

                     Person second)
              throws java.lang.NullPointerException

        Parameters:
        first - The first person.
        second - The second person.
        Returns:
        true if both persons are coauthors, otherwise false.

      • getCoauthorCommunity

        java.util.Collection<Person> getCoauthorCommunity(Person person,
                                                  int index)
                                           throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                  java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Retrieve a specific coauthor community of a given person.
        Parameters:
        person - The person.
        index - The community index.
        Returns:
        The coauthors of this community.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified person is null.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= getNumberOfCommunities())

      • getPublicationStreams

        default java.util.Collection<PublicationStream> getPublicationStreams()
        Retrieves an unmodifiable Collection view of all publication stream venues (i.e., all booktitles and all journals) in the MMDB.
        Returns:
        The publication stream venues.

      • publicationStreams

        default java.util.stream.Stream<PublicationStream> publicationStreams()
        Retrieves a combined, sequential stream of all publication stream venues (i.e., all booktitles and all journals) in the MMDB.
        Returns:
        The stream of all publication stream venues.
